title: Com Hem 2025 Company Profile: Valuation, Investors, Acquisition | PitchBook

title: The Carlyle Group and Providence Equity Partners to Acquire Com Hem | Carlyle
snippet: London and Stockholm - The Carlyle Group and Providence Equity Partners today announced they have signed an agreement to acquire Swedish cable TV operator Com Hem from its current owner EQT. Financial details were not disclosed. Com Hem is the leading cable TV operator in Sweden.

title: Com Hem
snippet: Q3 Announcement 2025 · Presentation · Webcast · Transcript · Divestment · EQT III acquired Com Hem AB, a Swedish cable TV operator, in 2003. Com Hem was one of the largest operators in Sweden, offering pay-TV and broadband internet access as the leading player in an attractive market.

title: Hem - 2025 Company Profile, Team, Funding & Competitors - Tracxn
snippet: The company's operation is limited to the US and Europe. It was created as a pivot out of the Fab.com, while carrying the funding, investors, and valuation of latter. ... Hem got acquired by Vitra on Feb 03, 2016.

title: HEM - 2025 Company Profile, Team, Competitors & Financials - Tracxn
